principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Cyberpunk neon.
Emotion First: The user should feel like a commander of a digital army.
Content is King: Data is the hero. Visualization is the story.
Negative Space: Use deep black voids to make the neon pop.
Contrast: High contrast text for readability in the dark.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, modal headers. DO NOT use Inter for headings.

code.usage: Token IDs, API keys, logs, code snippets.

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous (p-6, p-8) internally, but tight gaps (gap-4) for dashboard density.
layout_strategy.container_style: Fluid width with max-w-7xl for main content.

modes.dashboard: Grid with col-span-1 for stats, col-span-2/3 for charts, col-span-1 for activity feeds.
modes.marketing: Asymmetric 'Tetris' grid for features. Overlapping elements.

surface_strategies.name: The Tracing Beam
surface_strategies.usage: Active Agent Cards, Pricing Plans, Key Features
surface_strategies.implementation: Animated gradient border using framer-motion or CSS mask-image.

charts.style: Minimalist, thin lines, gradient fills with low opacity.

required_effects: Tracing beam border for active agents

icons.usage: Use Phosphor (Duotone) for feature icons, Lucide for UI controls.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use grids.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays separate good from extraordinary.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install fonts: `yarn add @fontsource/outfit @fontsource/inter @fontsource/jetbrains-mono`. 2. Update `tailwind.config.js` with the colors provided. 3. Create a `Layout` component that implements the glassmorphism sidebar and header. 4. Build the Dashboard using the Bento Grid strategy. 5. Use the provided images for the Landing Page.
